summary: Nexustube - A content creation and monetization platform with video sharing, posts, chat, earnings, profile, and store features
architectural_notes: Dark gradient background with neon vibe
Bottom navigation with 7 tabs: Home, Video, Post, Chat, Earn, Profile, Store

existing_features.title: Create a video upload interface that allows users to select and upload video files with a progress bar showing upload status
Create a video feed displaying uploaded videos with thumbnail previews
Implement video playback functionality with standard controls (play, pause, seek, volume)
Apply Nexustube branding with red primary color (#FF0000), yellow-orange secondary color (#FFC00E), and dark gradient background with neon vibe

new_feature_requests.summary: Core video upload and feed features
Implement backend storage and retrieval system for uploaded videos
